programme.title: The Space Shuttle Matures, Complex Space Construction & The Final Years of the Space Shuttle
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E13, The Space Shuttle Matures - The Space Transportation System changes the nature of orbital missions. Complex Construction in Space - Confidence in the shuttle begins to return and engineers for get the lessons of the past.

programme.title: Project Gemini, Venus Express, EMU & Deep Space Communication
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E04, Project Gemini Commences - Did Gemini give the US a lead in the space race? Venus Express - The last days of ESA's Venus probe. EMU - NASA's Extravehicular Mobility Unit. Deep Space Communications - ESA's worldwide network of giant dishes.

programme.title: Beyond Earth Orbit, IXV Vehicles & Galileo Satellites Lost and Found
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E09, Beyond Earth Orbit - The Apollo program takes bold new steps. IXV Re-entry Vehicle - Europe is working to perfect a re-entry vehicle. Galileo Satellites Lost and Found - Navigation satellites go into incorrect orbit.

programme.title: The Space Race, The Hubble, Chasing Comets & Space Debris
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E01, Cold War & The Start of the Space Race - Cold War rivalry and the acceleration of space exploration. Servicing Hubble - Preparations for Hubble's final servicing mission. Chasing a Comet - Launch and the difficult path to rendezvous.

programme.title: To The Moon, SpaceX's Dragon and Falcon & GAIA
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E10, To the Moon - The Apollo program achieves its major objective. Dragon, Falcon and Spacex - New directions in re-usable spacecraft. Gaia- Mapping our galaxy in unprecedented detail.

programme.title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E02, Project Mercury Begins - The start of NASA & America's first manned space program. Mars Express - The European Space Agency's Mars Satellite. The Soyuz Launch System - The gradual evolution of Russia's Soyuz launcher.

programme.title: The Apollo Program Begins, Caves & Planck
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E07, The Apollo Program Begins - At the very beginning of NASA's moon project things go wrong. Caves - ESA's special training program for astronauts. Planck - Mapping the cosmic microwave background radiation.

programme.title: Shooting Gallery: Asteroids and Comets / Galactic Visions: Alien Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E18, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Rocky Shores / Silent Partner
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E14, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Stargazer's Paradise
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Stargazer's Paradise, S02E04, The Atacama desert is a perfect place for watching the night sky. With still winds and only a handful of cloudy nights each year, it allows scientists to get the absolute most out of their tools.

programme.title: Borderland / Mars: Red Dawn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E15, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Fermi Paradox
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Fermi Paradox, S04E05, The Fermi Paradox asks the ultimate question: Given a few reasonable assumptions about the chance of life arising elsewhere in the universe and the distance between the stars, why has an alien civilization not presented itself?

programme.title: Cosmic Rays
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rays, S04E04, Cosmic rays can tell us much about the universe. They are not simply another form of light, but carriers of information about powerful and unseen processes at work thousands or even millions of light years away.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Gravity, S03E04, Gravity has long been a force that has intrigued scientists. Now, for the first time scientists are probing to detect gravity waves in space as well as mapping the gravity patterns of the moon.

programme.title: Seasons of Saturn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Seasons of Saturn, S03E01, Saturn is the second largest planet and has an astonishing 60 moons in its orbit. Thanks to the Cassini mission, it's also one of the most studied and most photographed planets in our neighborhood.

programme.title: Virtual Universe
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Virtual Universe, S02E06, Our understanding of the cosmos is limited by the amount of time we have to see it. Fortunately, computer simulations can help us see how galaxies interact over millions of years, and even how dark matter structures the universe.

programme.title: Hubble's Renaissance
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Hubble's Renaissance, S02E01, Before we can reach space, we must first be able to see it. Hundreds of years ago, the simple telescope was used to give us a seemingly closer vantage. Today, we use the awe-inspiring, and super powerful, Hubble Space Telescope.

programme.title: Cosmic Rainbow
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rainbow, S02E03, In the world of astronomy, how do we overcome the limits imposed by our own eyesight? The universe comes alive by viewing the cosmos in infrared light to gamma radiation.

programme.title: Vesta Unveiled
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Vesta Unveiled, S03E02, With the Dawn missions exploration of the asteroid Vesta and the dwarf planet Ceres, asteroids are a hot topic. See what these incredible missions have uncovered.

programme.title: Hidden Havens: Icy Moons / Icy Gems: Frozen Moons
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E17, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: The Giant Planets: Lords of Gravity / Outer Limits: Edge of the Solar System
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E16, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Science and the Shuttle
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Science and the Shuttle, S03E05, For more than 25 years the shuttle was our ticket to space, and our laboratory in orbit. Uncover the legacy of this amazing machine, and see what lies ahead.

programme.title: Milky Way
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Milky Way, S04E01, This episode traces our view of the Milky Way, from the mythology of ancient sky watchers to the efforts of scientists to map it from the inside out.

programme.title: The Hot Zone
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Hot Zone, S04E03, Mercury is one Earth's closest neighbors, but for centuries it eluded astronomer's best efforts to learn its secrets. But that has changed thanks to missions like Mariner and most recently, Messenger.

programme.title: Landing on Mars
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landing on Mars, S03E06, Mars sparks our curiosity like no other planet because it is so reachable. Despite having landed there, most of the information we gather is still done by instruments in the planet's orbit.

programme.title: Superscopes
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Superscopes, S02E02, The human eye can only see visible light, a small spectrum of electromagnetic waves. Today, we have instruments that let us perceive all wavelengths.

programme.title: The Big Bang
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Big Bang, S04E02, Throughout history, our nightly view of the universe has fueled our collective imagination. When it comes to the Big Bang, not even the most creative work of imagination can rival what science has revealed about the birth of the universe.

programme.title: Landsat
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landsat, S04E06, Take a look at Landsat 8, the advanced planetary explorer with a 900 million dollar price tag! It is designed to peer across multiple wavelengths to reveal complex and ever-changing details that are undetectable by the human eye.

programme.title: Windows to Other Worlds / Fountain of Creation
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E13, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Night Fire
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Night Fire, S02E05, The Northern Lights are more than just beautiful; they tell us about the make up of our planet, our sun, and may even be a signpost for the possibility of life on other planets.

programme.title: Water Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Water Worlds, S03E03, The key ingredient to life in the universe is water. Until recently we thought Earth was the only place in the solar system to have any water at all. Now that probes are peering around nearby worlds we are finding that is just not the case.

programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Green Death, S01E02, Investigating the old mine workings, Jo and the miner, Bert, become trapped beneath the surface when the lift is sabotaged. Bert touches some green slime and becomes infected.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Part 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Green Death, S01E03, The Doctor and Jo discover the mines terrible secret. Global Chemicals managing director, Stevens is determined that they wont live to reveal what they have learnt.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Part 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Green Death, S01E04, The Brigadier attempts to seal the giant maggots in the mine with explosives, but this only results in the creatures burrowing to the surface.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Part 5

programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Part 6
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Green Death, S01E06, Cliff is dying, and maggots are on the verge of transforming into giant flying insects. Time is running out for the Doctor as BOSS launches its plan for world domination.
programme.category: Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Science fiction, Series

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E13, A 14-year-old boy is charged with the murder of his sister, but his public defender believes the real killer is still on the loose. And two deteriorated slides, made 16 years earlier, give police the evidence they need to reopen the cold case.

programme.title: The Bone Keeper
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E22, In December 1985, when human bones are discovered in the woods, it puts an end to the search for missing teen David Reed. David's skull fractures point to murder; but it will be decades before investigators can find his killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E02, This is the story of the hunt for one of the most notorious serial killers in American history--the BTK killer. After committing at least seven brutal murders he vanished for over 25 years before sending clues of his crimes to the media in 2004.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E18, After 19 years, Kansas detectives reopen the case of a banker found beaten to death in his bed--and the chief suspect is his cheating wife. And a man with a guilty conscience helps Arkansas police to crack a cold case of murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E07, We follow Det. Vince Velazquez of Atlanta and Capt. Russell Popham of East Point, Ga., as they work to solve the 1995 rape and murder of 14-year-old Nacole Smith, one of Atlanta's most notorious unsolved crimes.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E20, A high school janitor is suspected in the murder of a young girl, but with only circumstantial evidence to go on, police must let the case go cold. And a woman asks the police to reopen the 24-year-old case of her cousin's disappearance.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E13, Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E04, Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E24, A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: A Killer Slips Away
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E10, The loving aunt of a close-knit family is stabbed to death in her home. It takes two decades for detectives to discover that a key witness was an imposter--and caused the case to go cold.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E18, A forensic scientist's painstaking examination of a rape kit helps solve the 15-year-old murder of a teenage girl. And when California investigators probe the murder of a 71-year-old man, they get help from the top suspect's former therapist.

programme.title: The Lost Patient
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E25, In 1979 Janie Landers disappears from a home for the impaired--the latest consequence of the facility's history of neglect. When Janie's body is found, there are many suspects but it is years before the killer is found.

programme.title: Circle of Friends
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E07, When 18-year-old Shannon Siders' body is found in the woods, everyone in the small town of Newaygo, Michigan, becomes a suspect--but no one is convicted of the crime.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2005, A 13-year-old girl's mother is murdered and 20 years later she helps bring the killer to justice, and a dogged policeman gets to the bottom of the brutal murder of a 63-year-old newspaper delivery woman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E01, In this special 100th edition of Cold Case Files, we look at the biggest serial murder case in U.S. history; hunt for the Green River Killer. Dave Reichert, the detective who made finding the killer his obsession, walks us through the case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E03, While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Cold Ashes
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E20, When a deadly house fire claims the life of a family in rural Oklahoma, investigators suspect foul play and it sends a mother on a decades-long crusade to find out what happened to her missing teenage daughter and best friend.

programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E04, Hallmark Original Series. Abby settles in and starts her job at her firm's Baltimore office.

programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E05, Hallmark Original Series. As Kevin remains missing, the O'Brien family nervously wait for news.

The Locket, 20021208000000 +0000, After his mother dies, a college dropout befriends a patient at a health-care center who gives him support and guidance. Stars Vanessa Redgrave. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame.

programme.title: The Storm
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E10, Sheppard and Teyla discover that a massive storm is approaching the city. The team must evacuate the city, and the Manarians offer to give them shelter. As they work to figure out a way to power up the shield, the city is invaded by the Genii.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E11, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) plays a dangerous game of cat and mouse as he attempts to regain control of Atlantis from the Genii, who have taken the city along with Weir (Torri Higginson) and McKay (David Hewlett) hostage.

programme.title: The Defiant One
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E12, Sheppard and McKay set out, along with two scientists, to explore when they stumble upon a distress beacon coming from a Wraith ship. When they move to investigate, they discover that the ship has been sending out it's SOS signal for 10,000 years.

programme.title: Hot Zone
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E13, A team of scientists are surveying the city for damage after the storm when they unknowingly release a virus causing hallucinations and death. The virus infects McKay, Zelenka, and Ford leaving Sheppard to stop it from spreading further.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E14, While searching a new planet, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) and the team find a paradise world, Proculus, that would make an ideal sanctuary for those fleeing from the Wraith. The local inhabitants, however, believe their goddess will not permit it.

programme.title: Visitation
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E09, With no recollection of how they got to the Destiny, crew members left behind over a year earlier make a mysterious return. After an unsettling turn, the memories stirred through regression therapy prove disastrous for those whove returned.

programme.title: Resurgence
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E10, In the hopes of finding something beneficial, the crew follows an energy signature that leads them to a mysterious sea of lifeless ships. With no visible signs of danger, the crew set off to take a closer look. But things may not be what they seem.

programme.title: Deliverance
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E11, Locked in a battle with a Drone Command Ship, the Destiny is surprised by the arrival of the aliens that abducted Rush and Chloe. After Destiny's position is revealed, the crew again comes under heavy attack. But this time, they have a plan.

programme.title: Twin Destinies
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E12, Excitement spreads through the ship as Eli believes hes found a way to dial Earth. But Dr. Rush has serious reservations about abandoning Destiny, and when the crew is interrupted by a distress call, it may just change the plans of the Destiny.

programme.title: Urgo
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E16, En route to a planet, the SG-1 are implanted with an alien spore that evolves into a being called Urgo. Though Urgo claims to be friendly, the suspicious team members work feverishly to rid themselves of the creature before it destroys their minds.

programme.title: A Hundred Days
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E17, SG-1 visits the friendly planet Edora and gathers to watch the annual meteor shower that lights up the sky like a fiery rain. But suddenly, wayward asteroids bombard the planet, destroying the Stargate. Can O'Neill and the team ever return home?

programme.title: Shades Of Grey
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E18, On a mission to Tollana, O'Neill steals a weapon there and takes it back to Earth. When Hammond discovers the deception, he suspends O'Neill. But O'Neill's misconduct is only the beginning of a deep mystery that could have catastrophic consequences.

programme.title: New Ground
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E19, SG-1 journeys to a planet where their arrival ignites a war between two cultures. A spy realizes his side could win the war if SG-1 and the Stargate can be neutralized. Will O'Neill and his team make the same realization and save themselves in time?

programme.title: Maternal Instinct
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E20, Bra'tac (Tony Amendola) arrives at Stargate Command with a wild story about interplanetary warfare with Apophis (Peter Williams). Daniel deduces that the battle is over Apophis' child, and races to save the child before Apophis can find him first.

programme.title: Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E21, Daniel finds a crystal skull identical to one first discovered by his grandfather. When Daniel stares into the skull's eyes, a force makes him disappear. Now SG-1 must find his grandfather to unlock the mystery of the skull and bring Daniel home.

programme.title: Nemesis
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E22, O'Neill is kidnapped by the Asgard and encounters a swarm of vicious metallic bug-like creatures on a mission to destroy Earth. O'Neill plans to blow up the ship and sacrifice himself, but can the team find another way to stop this apocalyptic plan?

programme.title: Small Victories
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S04E01, SG-1 is called upon to help a race of gentle, highly-intelligent aliens struggling against a swarm of deadly mechanical spiders called Replicators. But the situation becomes much more complicated when a lone Replicator is discovered back on Earth.

A Nurse to Die For, 20250617080200 +0000, A man hires a live-in nurse to help care for his sick daughter. However, as she continues to suffer a series of setbacks, he starts to wonder if the nurse might actually be the one keeping her sick.
Murder in My House, 20250617100000 +0000, A young divorcee learns that her new home was the site of a murder and that the killer may still be in the neighborhood.
Her Affair to Die For, 20250617120400 +0000, A young woman's seductive roommate becomes obsessed with her father, stopping at nothing to possess him.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E17, An escaped psychopath takes Summer and Stephanie hostage in a lifeguard tower, necessitating a thrilling subterranean rescue attempt by Mitch and Matt.

programme.title: Stakeout at Surfrider Beach
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E18, Mitch finds himself falling for an Italian actress who is being stalked by ruthless robbers. Meanwhile, CJ and Stephanie help Guido pretend to be a lifeguard in order to impress his visiting mother.

programme.title: Shattered, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E19, When he risks his life to save three teenagers, Mitch fractures his spine and is paralyzed. Hobie, Stephanie, and Sophie, his physical therapist, rally to repair his shattered life.

programme.title: Shattered, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E20, Paralyzed during a heroic rescue, Mitch undergoes a vigorous rehabilitation regimen. Meanwhile, Jason, a ten-year-old paraplegic, is pursued by a hitman trying to keep him from testifying against gangsters.

programme.title: Kicks
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E21, Mitch coaches Matt in an amateur kickboxing tournament, but the competition turns deadly when an enemy from Mitch's past gets him into the ring. Meanwhile, CJ, seduced by a fashion photographer, considers leaving Baywatch for a modeling career.

programme.title: Fatal Exchange
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E22, Mitch contends with an unorthodox, risk-taking Australian lifeguard, and rekindles his love affair with a beautiful journalist, Kaye Morgan.

programme.title: Race Against Time, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E01, Mitch's ex-wife flies in for a weekend visit. She introduces her new fianc Ken and informs Mitch she is taking Hobie back to Ohio with her. When Ken's private jet crashes in the ocean on takeoff, the Baywatch team have to rescue them!

programme.title: Race Against Time, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E02, A dramatic plane crash finds Hobie and his mother trapped in the rapidly flooding fuselage beneath the sea while Mitch and the Baywatch lifeguards mount a massive rescue effort to save the trapped passengers and crew.

programme.title: Lover's Cove
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E03, Romance is in the air at Baywatch as Mitch and Jackie's friendship grows more intense, Summer and Matt begin a relationship, and Hobie falls in love with Lauren, a junior lifeguard with a devastating secret.

programme.title: Blindside
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E04, John D. Cort, Mitch's friend and a former lifeguard, returns to Baywatch where his life undergoes a devastating change. Meanwhile, Hobie meets a very "unique" new friend.

programme.title: Skyrider
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E05, Summer has love problems when Slade returns from a world surfing tour to discover Matt and Summer are dating. CJ is persistently pursued by a bungee jumping balloonist. Meanwhile, Garner patrols the beach on horseback.

programme.title: Tentacles, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E06, A prison break gone awry finds Mitch held hostage by a beautiful woman and forced to perform surgery on her escaped convict husband. Meanwhile, Matt and Slade decide to settle their mutual affection for Summer in a daring surfing contest.

programme.title: Tentacles, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E07, Mitch removes a bullet from an escaped convict, only to realize that he and his wife have every intention of killing him. Stephanie's sister Caroline arrives with her fianc, who becomes the target of an attempted murder.

programme.title: Submersion
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E08, Mitch saves two boys from drowning. But when one ends up in a coma, Mitch suffers from PTSD and is left reevaluating his life as a lifeguard.

programme.title: Ironman Buchannon
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E09, Mitch's impending birthday prompts him to train for an ironman competition, getting swept off his feet by a younger woman along the way. Matt takes a night job to save money for a motorcycle, jeopardizing his coworkers through his exhaustion.

programme.title: Tower of Power
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E10, A new lifeguard helps Mitch and the Baywatch lifeguards confront an upsurge in gang activity, and CJ is enamored with a beach magician who nearly drowns during a bungled underwater stunt.

programme.title: The Child Inside
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E11, The Baywatch lifeguards stage a beach-oriented Special Olympics, becoming involved with two young physically-challenged athletes whose parents have abandoned them.
